data.text: Manual Mode By default, Kahi UI switches between dark and light mode depending on the user's preferences. As reported by the Browser / OS. However to provide a theme toggle or if you want to disable this behavior. You can use the data-mode="dark/light" attribute on the <html> element. <!-- prettier-ignore --> <html data-mode="dark"> <head> ... </head> </html>
data.render:
By default, Kahi UI switches between dark and light mode depending on the user's preferences. As reported by the Browser / OS. However to provide a theme toggle or if you want to disable this behavior. You can use the data-mode="dark/light" attribute on the <html> element.

<html data-mode="dark">
    <head>
        ...
    </head>
</html>
